text: Edward Malcolm SniderProfile , Philly.com; accessed April 11, 2016. (January 6, 1933 â€“ April 11, 2016), known as Ed Snider, was an American sportsperson. He was the chairman of Comcast Spectacor, a Philadelphia-based sports and entertainment company. He formerly owned the Philadelphia 76ers of the National Basketball Association. Snider died in Montecito, California from bladder cancer on April 11, 2016, aged 83. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from bladder cancer Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:Businesspeople from Washington, D.C. title: Ed Snider
